snippet.title: DINO MERCS Official Trailer
snippet.description:
DINO MERCS, a roguelite deckbuilding game, thrusts players into the role of a veteran operative within the clandestine Dark Solar Defense corporation. Survival demands skillful card deck construction, strategic operations, and intense combat, with a unique Card Positioning System adding a layer of complexity and challenging players to sequence their cards for optimal survival and triumph.

DINO MERCS on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1827640/DINO_MERCS/
